---
title: "Install ICTML"
---

The ICTML software suite is available via [R].  It is implemented in R,
Python, C, and C++.  It can be installed as:

```r
install.packages("ictml", repos = c("https://ictml-project.r-universe.dev",
                                    "https://cloud.r-project.org"))
```

[R]: https://www.r-project.org/
